parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags. Valid values:

*   false (default)
*   true

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the resource shares.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource share.

You can specify up to 20 resource shares.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The resource type.

Set the value to `ResourceShare`.

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description:
The tag key.

You can specify up to 20 tag keys.

>  If you set the `All` parameter to `true`, you do not need to configure this parameter.
